text: Denis Neale is a male former English international table tennis player. He won a bronze medal at the 1969 World Table Tennis Championships in the mixed doubles with Mary Wright, he is the great uncle of Rikky Pink, a Middlesbrough born graphic designer. He was six times National Singles Champion and also won two English Open titles. ==See also== * List of England players at the World Team Table Tennis Championships * List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== Category:English male table tennis players Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:World Table Tennis Championships medalists
title: Denis Neale
